properties.name: Victoria Falls (Zimbabwe side)
properties.why_notable: Main Falls view, Devil's Pool, bungee from bridge, UNESCO

properties.name: Great Zimbabwe
properties.why_notable: Africa's largest ancient stone ruins, medieval Shona civilization, UNESCO

properties.name: Mana Pools
properties.why_notable: Walking safaris among elephants, Zambezi floodplain, UNESCO

properties.name: Matobo Hills
properties.why_notable: Balancing rocks, San rock art, black rhino tracking, UNESCO

properties.name: Hwange National Park
properties.why_notable: Zimbabwe's largest park, huge elephant herds, excellent game

properties.name: Victoria Falls Hotel
properties.why_notable: Edwardian elegance overlooking the Falls bridge
